name: Necrotic Harvest 💀👨‍🌾
description:
Game :

Game made for Ludum Dare 52 compo with the theme "Harvest".
Everything was done by myself in 48 Hours.

Description :

Play as Anubis and harvest the souls of the deceased through the art of embalming.

Instructions :

The goal of the game is to guide and help Anubis embalm the dead to collect their souls.

Use your mouse to define Anubis actions (you can define an unlimited number of actions, Anubis will perform them in order).

To score points, you will have to take the mummified dead to the sacred hotel of souls.

Be careful, not all the dead are entitled to the same treatment, check the list of actions to perform by hovering over them.

Controls : Action
Control
Add action to queue
Left click
Clear action queue
Right click
Pause menu
Esc
